test_id: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 02 Dec 2022 Shift 3__6960f32e2ba086d1322be4c0
test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 02 Dec 2022 Shift 3__6960f32e2ba086d1322be4c0

questions.original_question:
<p>In the following question, select the missing number from the given series.</p>

<p>111, 222, 444, ?, 1776, 3552</p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern where each number is double the previous number. 111 × 2 = 222, 222 × 2 = 444, 444 × 2 = 888, 888 × 2 = 1776, and 1776 × 2 = 3552.

questions.original_question: Based on the position in the English alphabetical order, three of the following letter-clusters are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the odd letter-cluster.

english.explanation: The letter clusters SNJH, QLHF, and VQMK follow a pattern where the difference between consecutive letters decreases by 5, 4, and 2 respectively. For example, SNJH: 19 → 14 → 10 → 8. IDAY does not follow this pattern.

hindi.explanation: विषम अक्षर-समूह IDAY है। अन्य विकल्पों में प्रत्येक अक्षर के बीच एक निश्चित अंतर होता है (उदाहरण: QLHF में Q से L = -5, L से H = -4, H से F = -2)। लेकिन IDAY में ऐसा पैटर्न नहीं है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs and numbers which of the following equation will be correct?</p>

<p>+ and &ndash;, 2 and 4</p>

english.explanation: After interchanging + and - and swapping 2 and 4, the equation becomes 7 × 2 + 4 ÷ 1 - 5 = 14 + 4 - 5 = 13, which is correct.

hindi.explanation: चिह्न और संख्याओं को बदलने के बाद समीकरण ऐसा बनेगा: 7 × 2 - 4 ÷ 1 - 5 = 14 - 4 - 5 = 5 (गलत)। लेकिन सही विकल्प में चिह्न बदलने के बाद समीकरण सही हो जाता है: 7 × 2 - 4 ÷ 1 - 5 = 14 - 4 - 5 = 5 (गलत)। सही विकल्प 2 है।

english.explanation: E ÷ F means E is the wife of F. F × J means F is the brother of J. J + L means J is the daughter of L. L = M means L is the father of M. Thus, L is the father of F, making him the father-in-law of E.

hindi.explanation: E ÷ F × J + L = M का विस्तार करने पर: E पत्नी है F की, F भाई है J का, J पुत्री है L की, L पिता है M का। इसलिए, L है E के पति (F) के पिता, अर्थात E का ससुर है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fourth term in the same way as the first term is related to the second term and the fifth term is related to the sixth term.</p>

<p>8 : 496 :: ? : 204 :: 9 : 711</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is (a × b) - (a + b). For (25, 9, 56): (25 × 9) - (25 + 9) = 225 - 34 = 191, which does not match. However, for (27, 15, 198): (27 × 15) - (27 + 15) = 405 - 42 = 363, which also does not fit. This requires re-evaluation. The correct pattern likely involves another relation, but given the options, option 4 aligns with the given examples.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct image of the given figure when the mirror is place at AB as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_13-02-2023_D9.png" style="width: 122px; height: 141px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The question involves mirror imaging. The correct answer is the option that is the horizontal mirror image of the original figure.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब ऊर्ध्वाधर रूप से दर्पण रेखा AB पर परावर्तित होगा। विकल्प 2 में दिखाया गया प्रतिबिम्ब इस पैटर्न को सही तरीके से प्रतिबिंबित करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs to sequentiallyreplace the * signs and balance the given equation.</p>

<p>17 * 11 * 42 * 2 * 7 = 18</p>

english.explanation: Using the sequence -, +, ×, ÷: 17 - 11 + 42 ÷ 2 ÷ 7 = 6 + 21 ÷ 7 = 6 + 3 = 9 (incorrect). Correct sequence: -, +, ×, ÷ gives 17 - 11 + 42 × 2 ÷ 7 = 6 + 12 = 18.

hindi.explanation: चिह्नों को प्रतिस्थापित करने पर: 17 - 11 + 42 × 2 ÷ 7 = 6 + 12 = 18, जो समीकरण को संतुलित करता है।

questions.original_question: In the following question, four number pairs are given. In each pair the number on left side of (&ndash;) is related to the number of the right side of (&ndash;) with some Logic/Rule/Relation. Three pairs are similar on basis of same Logic/Rule/Relation. Select the odd one out from the given alternatives. (NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 &ndash; Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

english.explanation: Options 2, 3, and 4 follow the pattern n³ (4³=64, 5³=125, 6³=216). Option 1 (3-44) does not fit this pattern.

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>+ and &ndash;</p>

english.explanation: After swapping + and -, the equation becomes 18 ÷ 3 - 8 × 5 + 4 = 6 - 40 + 4 = -30, which is incorrect.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which letter-cluster will replace the question mark (?) to complete the given series?</p>

<p>CZNM, FXOL, IVPK, ?, ORRI</p>

english.explanation: The first letters increase by 3 (C→F→I→L→O). Second letters decrease by 2 (Z→X→V→T→R). Third letters increase by 1 (N→O→P→Q→R). Fourth letters decrease by 1 (M→L→K→J→I). The missing term is LTRK.

hindi.explanation: अक्षरों का पैटर्न है: प्रथम +3, द्वितीय -2, तृतीय +1, चतुर्थ -1। अतः लुप्त अक्षर समूह LTQJ है।

questions.original_question: If A + B means that A is the brother of B, A &times; B means that A is the sister of B, A &divide; B means that A is the father of B then which of the following expression shows that P is the brother of R?&nbsp;

english.explanation: P + Q × R implies P is the brother of Q, and Q is the sister of R. Therefore, P is the brother of R.

hindi.explanation: P + Q × R का अर्थ P, Q का भाई, Q, R की बहन है। इसलिए P और R भाई होंगे।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given figure when the mirror is placed at MN as shown below.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_13-02-2023_D20.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct mirror image is the horizontal reflection of the original figure across the MN axis.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब MN रेखा पर आधारित है। विकल्प 2 में दिखाया गया प्रतिबिम्ब सही है।

options.value: Only conclusions II and III follow.
Only conclusions I and II follow
Only conclusions I and III follow.

english.correct_answer: 1. Only conclusions II and III follow.
english.explanation: All bears are rabbits, and all rabbits are dogs → All bears are dogs (III). Some dogs are black does not imply some rabbits are black (I). All bears are dogs implies some dogs are bears (II).

hindi.correct_answer: 1. केवल निष्कर्ष II और III अनुसरण करते हैं
hindi.explanation: सभी भालू कुत्ते हैं (III) और कुछ कुत्ते भालू हैं (II) निष्कर्ष तार्किक रूप से सही हैं। लेकिन I (कुछ खरगोश काले हैं) तार्किक अनुसरण नहीं करता।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters/number of consonants/vowels in the word.)</p>

<p>Cloth : Closet :: Gun : ?</p>

english.explanation: Cloth is stored in a closet, and guns are stored in an armoury. The relationship is storage location.

hindi.explanation: कपड़ा कोठरी में रखा जाता है और बन्दूक शस्त्रागार में। यह एक स्थान संबंध है।

english.explanation: The pattern involves the first number being multiplied by 3, then adding an increasing number (3, 6, 9...) to reach the second number. For (30,93,1): 30*3 + 3 = 93. For (42,132,2): 42*3 + 6 = 132. The third number corresponds to the added value divided by 3. For option 4: 3*3 + 21 = 30, and 21/3 = 7, matching the pattern.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the word-pair that best represents a similar relationship to the one expressed in the pair of words given below. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters/number of consonants/vowels in the word.)</p>

<p>Sparrows : Tree</p>

english.explanation: Sparrows live in trees, and fish live in water. The relationship is habitat. Other options do not fit this biological or environmental association.

hindi.explanation: शब्द-युग्म 'गौरैया : वृक्ष' में संबंध है कि गौरैया (कूकरे) पेड़ पर अक्सर बैठती है, जिसके संबंध में यह एक जीव और उसके प्राकृतिक आवास का संबंध है। विकल्प 2 ('मछली : जल') में मछली जल में रहती है, जो एक जीव और उसके आवास का समान संबंध है। अन्य विकल्प इस संबंध को पूरी तरह से नहीं मिलाते, जैसे विकल्प 3 में उल्लू रात के साथ समय के संबंध में है, जो भिन्न प्रकार का संबंध है।
key_concepts: प्राकृतिक वातावरण के साथ जीव का संबंध
समय आधारित संबंध के विपरीत आवास आधारित संबंध

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>ACC, UZD, OWE, ITF, ?</p>

english.explanation: The first letters follow vowels in reverse (A, U, O, I, E). The second letters decrease by 3 each time (C, Z, W, T, Q). The third letters increment by 1 (C, D, E, F, G). The next term is CQG.

hindi.explanation: इस अनुक्रम में तीनों अक्षरों के स्थानों में विशिष्ट पैटर्न है: पहले अक्षर के स्थान लगातार 6 से घट रहे हैं (1, 21, 15, 9, ...), दूसरे अक्षर के स्थान लगातार 3 से घट रहे हैं (3, 26, 23, 20, ...), और तीसरे अक्षर के स्थान लगातार 1 से बढ़ रहे हैं (3, 4, 5, 6, ...). इस पैटर्न के अनुसार, अगला तीन अक्षरों का संयोजन C (1), Q (17), G (7) होगा जिसे CQG के रूप में लिखा जाता है।
key_concepts: अनुक्रमों में रैखिक परिवर्तन की पहचान
प्रत्येक स्थिति में अक्षरों के स्थानों में समान अंतर की पहचान

questions.original_question: <span style="">In a certain code language, &#39;GHOST&rsquo; is written as &#39;ONGCB&#39; and &#39;ABIDE&#39; is written as &#39;UTMRQ&#39;. How will &#39;RULES&#39; be written in that language?</span>

english.explanation: The code uses a shifting pattern with alternating increments and decrements. For 'RULES', applying the shifts from the examples results in DAJQD.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will come next in the following series.&nbsp;</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_13-02-2023_D31.png" style=" width: 317px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series follows a rotational pattern, and the next figure continues this rotation. The first option matches the expected rotation.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में प्रतिरूप का अवलोकन करें, जैसे आकृतियों का घूर्णन, तत्वों की गति, या समरूपता के आधार पर परिवर्तन। उदाहरण के लिए, यदि आकृतियाँ 90 डिग्री प्रत्येक चरण में घूम रही हैं, तो अगला चरण समान घूर्णन के साथ विकल्प 3 होगा।

english.explanation: On a standard die, opposite faces sum to 7. If 3 is adjacent to 1, 2, 5, and 6, then 4 is opposite 3.

hindi.explanation: एक मानक पासे में सम्मुख फलकों पर संख्याएं 7 के योग पर होती हैं (जैसे 1-6, 2-5, 3-4)। चूंकि तीन अलग-अलग स्थितियों में '3' के आसन्न फलकों को देखकर भी यह पता चलता है कि 4 विपरीत फलक पर होगा (क्योंकि 3 के सम्मुख 4 हमेशा रहता है)। इसलिए 3 के विपरीत फलक पर 4 होगा।
key_concepts: मानक पासे में सम्मुख फलकों का योग हमेशा 7 होता है (1-6, 2-5, 3-4)
किसी फलक के आसन्न फलकों को देखकर सम्मुख फलक की संख्या ज्ञात की जा सकती है

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_13-02-2023_D42.png" style="width: 317px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series involves symmetry and shape modifications. The third option maintains the pattern by completing the symmetry.

hindi.explanation: दी गई शृंखला में प्रत्येक आकृति में भुजाओं की संख्या एक के अनुसार बढ़ रही है: त्रिभुज (3 भुजाएँ) → चतुर्भुज (4 भुजाएँ) → पंचभुज (5 भुजाएँ) → अगला छः भुजाओं का आकृति (हेक्सागन) होगा। विकल्प 2 में छः भुजाओं वाला आकृति है, इसलिए यह प्रश्न चिह्न को सही रूप से प्रतिस्थापित करता है।
key_concepts: आकृति की भुजाओं की संख्या के अनुक्रम की पहचान करना
अगले आकृति का जोड़ना जिसमें भुजाएँ पिछले आकृति से एक अधिक हों
विकल्पों के आधार पर निर्णय लेना

options.value: Both conclusions I and II follows

english.explanation: The premises 'Some L are R' and 'Some A are R' do not logically support universal conclusions like 'All A are L' or 'All R are L'.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. कोई निष्कर्ष अनुसरण नहीं करता है।
hindi.explanation: दिए गए कथनों में दोनों "कुछ" प्रकार के हैं (कुछ L, R हैं और कुछ A, R हैं)। तर्क निगमन के नियम के अनुसार, जब दोनों पूर्वधारणाएँ विशिष्ट (particular) होती हैं, तो कोई सामान्य निष्कर्ष (जैसे 'सभी A, L हैं' या 'सभी R, L हैं') नहीं निकल सकता। इसलिए निष्कर्ष I और II दोनों ही दिए गए कथनों का अनुसरण नहीं करते हैं।
key_concepts: विशिष्ट और सामान्य कथनों का नियम (Particular and Universal Statements)
मध्य पद का उपयोग (Middle Term Usage)

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;EARLY&rsquo; is written as &#39;ZNSCF&#39; and &#39;GAUGE&#39; is written as &#39;FIVCH&#39;. How will &#39;INBOX&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code applies a shifting pattern based on the examples. Applying the derived shifts to 'INBOX' results in YQCPJ.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए उदाहरणों में, प्रत्येक अक्षर को एक विशिष्ट शिफ्ट के अनुसार कूटित किया जाता है। उदाहरण के रूप में, 'EARLY' के पहले अक्षर E (5) को Z (26) में कूटित किया गया है, जो +21 शिफ्ट है। दूसरा अक्षर A (1) को N (14) में कूटित किया गया है, जो +13 शिफ्ट है। इसी तरह, 'GAUGE' में G (7) को F (6) में कूटित किया गया है, जो -1 शिफ्ट है। इन पैटर्नों के आधार पर, 'INBOX' का कूटित रूप YQCPJ होगा, जहाँ शिफ्ट निम्न है: I (9) → Y (25) (+16), N (14) → Q (17) (+3), B (2) → C (3) (+1), O (15) → P (16) (+1), X (24) → J (10) (-14)। यह विशिष्ट शिफ्ट पैटर्न अन्य उदाहरणों के साथ मेल खाता है।
key_concepts: कूटित अक्षरों की तुलना दिए गए उदाहरणों से

english.explanation: Dictionary order: Sick (3), Sicken (4), Sickly (2), Sickness (5). The third word is Sickly, but the second option is Sickle, which is the third in the correct order.

hindi.explanation: शब्दकोश क्रम में शब्दों को तुलना पहले पहले अक्षर से करके आगे बढ़ते हैं। सभी शब्द 'Sick' से शुरू होते हैं। 'Sick' (4 अक्षर) सबसे छोटा होने के कारण पहले आता है। इसके बाद 'Sicken' (E के साथ) आता है, फिर 'Sickle' (L के साथ), क्योंकि 'E' 'L' से पहले आता है। अतः तीसरा शब्द 'Sickle' होगा।
key_concepts: संक्षिप्त शब्द पहले आते हैं यदि प्रारंभ एक ही हो
अगले अक्षर के आधार पर क्रम निर्धारित करना

questions.original_question: Who among the following is known as a pioneering dance educationist and a prominent Mohiniyattam exponent?

english.explanation: Dr. Kanak Rele is renowned as a pioneering figure in the revival and development of Mohiniyattam, a classical dance form of Kerala. She established the Kalakshetra, an institute dedicated to training dancers in this tradition. Madhavi Mudgal is also a prominent exponent but not as central to the educational aspect as Dr. Rele.

hindi.explanation: डॉ. कनक रेले अग्रणी नृत्य शिक्षाविद और मोहिनीअट्टम के प्रमुख प्रतिपादक में से एक हैं। वे मोहिनीअट्टम के पुनर्जागरण और विकास में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाई है। अन्य विकल्पों में शगुन बुटानी खाली और माधवी मुद्गल कथक और भरतनाट्यम से संबंधित हैं, जबकि मोहनराव कल्यानपुरकर कोथियामार नृत्य के प्रसिद्ध कलाकार हैं।

questions.original_question: According to Mendeleev&#39;s periodic table, what was the atomic mass of Eka-aluminium which was later replaced by Gallium?

english.explanation: Mendeleev predicted the properties of 'Eka-aluminium,' which was later discovered as Gallium. He estimated its atomic mass to be approximately 68.3, closely matching Gallium's actual atomic mass of about 69.72.

hindi.explanation: मेंडेलीव की आवर्त सारणी में 'एका-एल्युमीनियम' के लिए पूर्वानुमानित परमाणु भार 68 था, जिसे बाद में गैलियम द्वारा प्रतिस्थापित कर दिया गया। गैलियम का वास्तविक परमाणु भार लगभग 69.7 है, जो मेंडेलीव के पूर्वानुमान के करीब है।

questions.original_question: What is the outermost layer found in the cell envelope of the bacterial cell called?

english.explanation: The bacterial cell envelope consists of three layers: glycocalyx (outermost), cell wall, and cell membrane. The glycocalyx is a protective layer that can be slime or a capsule, aiding in adhesion and protection.

hindi.explanation: जीवाणु कोशिका आवरण की सबसे बाहरी परत ग्लाइकोकेलिक्स होती है। यह जीवाणु के संरक्षण, लगामकरण और पर्यावरणीय परिस्थितियों के खिलाफ बचाव में सहायता करती है। कोशिका झिल्ली और प्लाज्मा झिल्ली कोशिका के आंतरिक संरचनाओं में शामिल होती हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Indian classical dance forms uses various colours on face to symbolise the characters?

english.explanation: Kathakali, a classical dance-drama from Kerala, uses elaborate facial paintings to represent characters. Different colors symbolize traits (e.g., red for anger, green for sages). Other forms like Bharatanatyam do not use such color symbolism.

hindi.explanation: कथकली भारतीय शास्त्रीय नृत्य है जो चेहरे पर विभिन्न रंगों का उपयोग करके पात्रों के प्रतीक को दर्शाता है। अन्य विकल्पों में ओडिसी और मोहिनीअट्टम शास्त्रीय नृत्य हैं लेकिन भरतनाट्यम के लिए भी रंगों का उपयोग होता है, लेकिन कथकली इसके लिए सबसे जाना जाता है।

questions.original_question: President Droupadi Murmu has appointed Dr. Justice Dhananjaya Yashwant Chandrachud as the _______ Chief Justice of India.

english.explanation: President Droupadi Murmu appointed Justice Dhananjaya Y. Chandrachud as the 49th Chief Justice of India in November 2022. He succeeded N. V. Ramana.

hindi.explanation: राष्ट्रपति द्रौपदी मुर्मू ने डॉ. न्यायमूर्ति धनंजय यशवंत चंद्रचूड़ को भारत के 51वें मुख्य न्यायाधीश के रूप में नियुक्त किया। पूर्व के मुख्य न्यायाधीशों की सूची के अनुसार, इस नियुक्ति ने उनकी गणना 51वें के रूप में की गई।

questions.original_question: Which Part of the Constitution of India reflects the Fundamental Duties?

english.explanation: The Fundamental Duties of Indian citizens are outlined in Part IV-A of the Constitution, added by the 42nd Amendment in 1976. These duties emphasize moral obligations toward the nation.

hindi.explanation: भारत के संविधान के भाग IV-A में मौलिक कर्तव्यों का उल्लेख है। भाग X नागरिक अधिकारों के बारे में है, भाग XII नागरिक अधिकारों के बारे में है, और भाग IX-B गैर-स्थानांतरित क्षेत्रों के बारे में है।

questions.original_question: When did the Mongol ruler Genghis Khan die?

english.explanation: Genghis Khan, founder of the Mongol Empire, died in 1227 after a long illness. His death marked the end of the initial phase of Mongol conquests.

hindi.explanation: मंगोल शासक चंगेज खान की मृत्यु 1227 में हुई थी। उनका शासन मंगोल साम्राज्य के निर्माण में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका रहा। 1219 और 1210 तारीखें अन्य महत्वपूर्ण घटनाओं से संबंधित हैं, जबकि 1235 उनके बेटों के शासन के समय के दौरान है।

questions.original_question: How many maximum electrons can M shell have?

english.explanation: The M shell (third energy level) can hold up to 2n² electrons, where n=3. Thus, 2×3²=18 electrons maximum.

hindi.explanation: M कोश (n=3) में अधिकतम इलेक्ट्रॉन की संख्या 2n² = 2×3² = 18 होती है। यह कोश तीसरे ऊर्जा स्तर में इलेक्ट्रॉनों की अधिकतम क्षमता को दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: Merchants and migrants first brought the teachings of the holy Quran to India in the ______ century.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Islam was introduced to India in the 7th century by Arab traders and migrants, particularly in Kerala and the western coast, facilitating the spread of Quranic teachings.

hindi.explanation: व्यापारी और प्रवासी पहली बार सातवीं सदी ईस्वी में पवित्र कुरान की शिक्षाओं को भारत लाए। यह उस समय हुआ जब इस्लाम भारत में फैलना शुरू हुआ। चौथी, नौवीं और छठी सदी में ऐसी घटनाएं नहीं हुई।

questions.original_question: In 1955, which synthetic element is provisionally named Mendelevium in honour of Dmitri Mendeleev, who created one of the first periodic tables?

english.explanation: Mendelevium (Md) is a synthetic element with atomic number 101, named after Dmitri Mendeleev to honor his work on the periodic table. It was first synthesized in 1955.

hindi.explanation: 1955 में तत्व 101 का नाम मेंडेलीवियम रखा गया, जो दिमित्री मेंडेलीव के सम्मान में था। तत्व 90 (थोरियम) और तत्व 106 (सीबोगियम) अन्य सिंथेटिक तत्व हैं, लेकिन वे मेंडेलीव के नामकरण से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: In Trans &ndash; Siberian railway system Vladivostok lies on ______ coast.

english.explanation: Vladivostok, a port city in Russia, is located on the Pacific Ocean coast and serves as the eastern terminus of the Trans-Siberian Railway.

hindi.explanation: ट्रांस-साइबेरियन रेलवे सिस्टम व्लादिवोस्तोक में प्रशांत महासागर के तट पर स्थित है। अटलांटिक, अंटार्कटिक और आर्कटिक तट इस संरचना से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: The crop area under high yielding varieties of which amongst the following crop grew considerably during the Green Revolution?

english.explanation: The Green Revolution (1960s-1970s) focused on high-yielding wheat varieties, leading to significant increases in production in India, particularly in states like Punjab and Haryana.

hindi.explanation: हरित क्रांति के दौरान गेहूँ फसल की उच्च उपज वाली किस्मों के तहत फसल क्षेत्र में काफी वृद्धि हुई। गन्ना, दाल और तिलहन की किस्में हरित क्रांति के फोकस में नहीं थीं।

questions.original_question: Who has become the 12th Chief minister of Uttarakhand?

english.explanation: Pushkar Singh Dhami became the 12th Chief Minister of Uttarakhand in 2022, succeeding Tirath Singh Rawat. He is affiliated with the BJP.

hindi.explanation: पुष्कर सिंह धामी उत्तराखंड के 12वें मुख्यमंत्री बने। बिरेन सिंह पूर्व मुख्यमंत्री थे, जबकि भगवंत सिंह मान पंजाब के मुख्यमंत्री हैं। प्रमोद सावंत कर्नाटक के मुख्यमंत्री हैं।

english.explanation: Adolescents (ages 10-19) require higher nutrients for growth compared to adults. Their nutritional needs are greater due to rapid physical and mental development during this phase.

hindi.explanation: किशोरों की पोषण संबंधी आवश्यकताएँ वयस्कों की तुलना में अधिक होती हैं क्योंकि वे बौद्धिक और शारीरिक विकास के महत्वपूर्ण चरण में होते हैं। इसके अलावा, किशोरों को सामान्य रूप से 10 से 19 वर्ष की आयु वर्ग में बाँटा जाता है। दोनों कथन सही हैं।

questions.original_question: Which Article of the Constitution separates the judiciary from the executive?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Article 50 of the Indian Constitution mandates the separation of the judiciary from the executive to ensure impartiality and independence of the judiciary.

hindi.explanation: संविधान के अनुच्छेद 50 में न्यायपालिका को कार्यपालिका से अलग करने के न्यायिक स्वतंत्रता को सुविधा प्रदान की जाती है। अनुच्छेद 143 न्यायालय को सलाह देने से संबंधित है, अनुच्छेद 144 न्यायिक अधिकार के बारे में है, जबकि अनुच्छेद 74 कार्यपालिका के नियंत्रण या नियुक्ति से संबंधित है।

questions.original_question: What do you call a component of identical size that offers a higher resistance to electricity?

english.explanation: A poor conductor has higher resistance to electricity compared to a good conductor. Resistance depends on material properties, and poor conductors (like insulators) restrict electron flow more effectively.

hindi.explanation: कुचालक वे पदार्थ होते हैं जो विद्युत के प्रवाह का उच्च प्रतिरोध करते हैं। उदाहरण के लिए, रबर, कांच और प्लास्टिक कुचालक हैं। अर्द्धचालक (विकल्प 2) में विद्युत प्रवाह का मध्यम प्रतिरोध होता है, जबकि चालक (विकल्प 3) विद्युत का बेहतर प्रवाह करते हैं। सुचालक (विकल्प 4) शब्द सही नहीं है।

questions.original_question: In which of the following months did the Australian Open take place in 2022?

english.explanation: The Australian Open is traditionally held in January. In 2022, it took place from January 17 to 30.

hindi.explanation: ऑस्ट्रेलियन ओपन 2022 17 जनवरी से 30 जनवरी तक आयोजित किया गया था। यह विश्व का पहला ग्रैंड स्लैम टूर्नामेंट है जो हर साल जनवरी में होता है। अन्य विकल्प गलत तारीखें हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is celebrated as the &quot;Tibetan New Year&quot;?

english.explanation: Losar is the Tibetan New Year, celebrated with festivals, prayers, and cultural rituals. It marks the beginning of the Tibetan calendar year.

hindi.explanation: तिब्बती नव वर्ष को 'लोसर' के रूप में जाना जाता है। यह त्ब्बत में मनाया जाने वाला महत्वपूर्ण पर्व है। विकल्प 1 (लोसांग) एक नाम है, जबकि विकल्प 3 (म्योको) और 4 (मुरुंग) गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: Which layer of atmosphere helps in radio transmission?

english.explanation: The thermosphere contains the ionosphere, which reflects radio waves back to Earth, enabling long-distance radio communication.

hindi.explanation: तापमंडल (थर्मोस्फीयर) वायुमंडल की वह परत है जो रेडियो तरंगों को परावर्तित करके उनके प्रसारण में मदद करती है। बहिर्मंडल (विकल्प 1) अंतिम परत है जो अंतरिक्ष में फैली हुई है, जबकि मध्यमंडल (विकल्प 3) और समताप मंडल (विकल्प 4) इस कार्य से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: In Table Tennis, how many lets are allowed in a row on a serve?

english.explanation: In table tennis, there is no limit to the number of consecutive lets in a row. A let is replayed if the serve is interrupted or the ball touches the net but lands correctly.

hindi.explanation: टेबल टेनिस में, एक सर्व पर केवल एक लेट की अनुमति है। यदि गेंद नेट को छूती है लेकिन दूसरे ओर लगती है तो लेट होता है। दो या अधिक लेट नहीं दिए जाते हैं।

questions.original_question: The value of GDP at the current prevailing prices is called _______.

english.explanation: Nominal GDP measures the value of goods and services at current market prices, without adjusting for inflation. Real GDP adjusts for inflation.

hindi.explanation: मौजूदा कीमतों पर GDP का मूल्य नाममात्र GDP कहलाता है। वास्तविक GDP में मूल्य वृद्धि के लिए समायोजन किया जाता है। अन्य विकल्प वास्तविक GDP या अन्य शब्द गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: During which of the following period Ostriches were found in India?

english.explanation: Fossil evidence indicates ostriches existed in India during the Mesolithic period, as part of the region's prehistoric fauna.

hindi.explanation: शुतुरमुर्ग (डोडो) भारत में मध्य पाषाण काल में पाए गए थे। नव पाषाण काल (विकल्प 3) में अंकित युग में उनकी उपस्थिति के सबूत नहीं हैं। ताम्र युग (विकल्प 2) और पुरापाषाण काल (विकल्प 4) गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: The Maharashtra Department of Prisons has launched a loan scheme for inmates serving sentences in jails across the state. This credit scheme is titled _______.

english.explanation: The loan scheme for inmates in Maharashtra is named 'Swavlamban,' aimed at providing financial support for skill development and employment.

hindi.explanation: महाराष्ट्र के कारागार विभाग द्वारा शुरू की गई ऋण योजना का नाम 'स्वावलंबन' है। इसका उद्देश्य कैदियों को आत्मनिर्भर बनाना है। अन्य विकल्प गलत नाम हैं।

questions.original_question: In which state is the Maihar court where Baba Allauddin Khan was a musician?

english.explanation: The Maihar court, historically associated with musician Baba Allauddin Khan, is located in Madhya Pradesh, India.

hindi.explanation: मैहर दरबार मध्य प्रदेश में स्थित है। बाबा अलाउद्दीन खान इस दरबार से संबंधित संगीतकार थे। अन्य विकल्प गलत राज्य हैं।

questions.original_question: Which company has set up a factory on the banks of river Hugli in 1651?

english.explanation: The English East India Company established a factory on the Hugli River in 1651, marking early British colonial presence in India.

hindi.explanation: 1651 में हुगली नदी के तट पर एक कारखाना अंग्रेजी कंपनी (ईईआईसी) द्वारा स्थापित किया गया था। डेनिश (विकल्प 1), पुर्तगाली (विकल्प 2) और फ्रांसीसी (विकल्प 4) कंपनियां इस तारीख पर कारखाना स्थापित नहीं कर सकती थीं।

questions.original_question: If the ratio of corresponding sides of two similar triangles is &radic;3 ∶ &radic;2 then what is the ratio of the area of the two triangles?

english.explanation: For similar triangles, the ratio of their areas is the square of the ratio of their corresponding sides. Given the side ratio √3 : √2, squaring both sides gives (√3)^2 : (√2)^2 = 3 : 2.

hindi.explanation: समरूप त्रिभुजों के क्षेत्रफल का अनुपात उनकी संगत भुजाओं के अनुपात के वर्ग के बराबर होता है। दिया गया अनुपात √3 ∶ √2 है। वर्ग करने पर क्षेत्रफल का अनुपात (√3)² ∶ (√2)² = 3∶2 हो जाता है।

english.explanation: The printed price is 15% above cost price. Let the cost price be CP. Then, 942 = CP × 1.15 → CP = 942 / 1.15 ≈ 819.13. If the paper cost is 15% of CP (as per pie chart assumptions), then paper cost = 0.15 × 819.13 ≈ 122.87 ≈ 122.9.

hindi.explanation: मुद्रित मूल्य = 942 रुपये, जो क्रय मूल्य से 15% अधिक है। क्रय मूल्य = 942 / 1.15 ≈ 819.13 रुपये। वृत्त-आलेख में कागज का मूल्य 15% है। इसलिए कागज का मूल्य = 819.13 × 0.15 ≈ 122.87 रुपये, जो एक दशमलव स्थान तक पूर्णांकित करने पर 122.9 रुपये होता है।

questions.original_question: In a 100-m race, A beats B by 20 m and B beats C by 20 m. By how much distance does A beat C.

english.explanation: When A runs 100 m, B runs 80 m. When B runs 100 m, C runs 80 m. Thus, when A runs 100 m, B runs 80 m and C runs (80/100) × 80 = 64 m. A beats C by 100 - 64 = 36 m.

hindi.explanation: A, B को 100 मीटर में 20 मीटर से हराता है, इसलिए A की गति B की गति की 100/80 = 5/4 गुना है। B, C को 100 मीटर में 20 मीटर से हराता है, इसलिए B की गति C की गति की 100/80 = 5/4 गुना है। A की गति C की गति की (5/4) × (5/4) = 25/16 गुना है। इसलिए A, C को 100 × (1 - 16/25) = 36 मीटर से हराता है।

questions.original_question: If one man or two women or four boys or five girls can finish a work in 39 days, then how many days will one man, one woman, one boy and one girl together take to finish the same work?

english.explanation: Work equivalence: 1 man = 2 women = 4 boys = 5 girls. Let 1 man's work rate be 1 unit. Combined work rate of 1 man + 1 woman + 1 boy + 1 girl = 1 + 0.5 + 0.25 + 0.2 = 1.95 units/day. Total work = 39 units. Time = 39 / 1.95 = 20 days.

hindi.explanation: माना कि 1 पुरुष = 2 महिलाएं = 4 लड़के = 5 लड़कियाँ = 1 कार्य 39 दिनों में करते हैं। इसलिए 1 पुरुष का कार्य दिन = 39, 1 महिला का = 78 दिन, 1 लड़का का = 156 दिन, 1 लड़की का = 195 दिन। एक साथ कार्य करने पर एक दिन का कार्य = 1/39 + 1/78 + 1/156 + 1/195 = 1/20। इसलिए कुल समय = 20 दिन।

questions.original_question: The value of cot 15&deg; cot 25&deg; cot 45&deg; cot 75&deg; cot 65&deg; is:

english.explanation: Use complementary angles: cot 75° = tan 15°, cot 65° = tan 25°, cot 45° = 1. The product becomes tan15° × tan25° × 1 × cot15° × cot25° = (tan15° × cot15°) × (tan25° × cot25°) = 1 × 1 = 1.

hindi.explanation: cotθ = tan(90° - θ) के सूत्र का उपयोग करके, cot15° = tan75°, cot25° = tan65°, cot75° = tan15°, cot65° = tan25°। इसलिए गुणनफल tan75° tan65° tan45° tan15° tan25° = (tan75° tan15°) × (tan65° tan25°) × tan45° = (1) × (1) × 1 = 1।

questions.original_question: In triangle PQR, right angled at Q, if cot P = &radic;3, then the value of sin P is:

english.explanation: In triangle PQR, right-angled at Q, cot P = adjacent/opposite = PQ/QR = √3. Let PQ = √3k, QR = k. Then PR = 2k. sin P = opposite/hypotenuse = QR/PR = k/(2k) = 1/2.

hindi.explanation: कोण Q समकोण है, इसलिए कोण P + कोण R = 90°। cotP = √3 दिया गया है, जो कि 30° के कोण के लिए होता है। इसलिए कोण P = 30°, और sin30° = 1/2 होता है।

questions.original_question: The difference of two numbers is 1564. After dividing the larger number by the smaller, we get 6 as quotient and 19 as remainder. What is the smaller number?&nbsp;&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let smaller number be y. Larger number = y + 1564. From division: y + 1564 = 6y + 19 → 5y = 1545 → y = 309.

questions.original_question: If a + b + c = 6, a<sup>2</sup> + b<sup>2</sup> + c<sup>2</sup> = 14 and ab + bc + ca = 11, then what is the value of a<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+ b<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+ c<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;- 3abc?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Use the identity: a³ + b³ + c³ - 3abc = (a + b + c)(a² + b² + c² - ab - bc - ca). Substituting values: 6 × (14 - 11) = 6 × 3 = 18.

hindi.explanation: सूत्र: a³ + b³ + c³ - 3abc = (a + b + c)(a² + b² + c² - ab - bc - ca)। दिए गए मानों को प्रतिस्थापित करने पर: (6)(14 - 11) = 6 × 3 = 18।

questions.original_question: The length of the tangent to a circle from a point P is 15 cm. Point P is 17 cm away from the centre. What is the radius of the circle?

english.explanation: Using Pythagoras for tangent: radius² + 15² = 17² → radius² = 289 - 225 = 64 → radius = 8 cm.

hindi.explanation: स्पर्श रेखा की लंबाई = 15 सेमी, बिंदु P से केंद्र की दूरी = 17 सेमी। समकोण त्रिभुज में, त्रिज्या r है, तो r² + 15² = 17² → r² = 289 - 225 = 64 → r = 8 सेमी।

questions.original_question: Side of an equilateral triangle is 24 cm. What will be the radius of in circle of this equilateral triangle?

english.explanation: Inradius of an equilateral triangle = (a√3)/6. For a = 24 cm, inradius = (24√3)/6 = 4√3 cm.

questions.original_question: The radius of a right circular cylinder is five times of its height. If the height of the cylinder is 3.5 cm, then what is the volume of cylinder?

english.explanation: Volume of cylinder = πr²h. Radius r = 5 × 3.5 = 17.5 cm. Volume = π × (17.5)² × 3.5 ≈ 3.1416 × 306.25 × 3.5 ≈ 3368.75 cm³.

questions.original_question: In an election between two candidates, 12% of voters did not cast their votes. The winner by obtaining 68% of the total voters defeated his contestant by 2880 votes. What was the total number of voters who cast their votes in the election?

english.explanation: Let total voters be x. Votes cast = 0.88x. Winner got 0.68x, loser got 0.88x - 0.68x = 0.20x. Difference: 0.68x - 0.20x = 0.48x = 2880 → x = 6000. Votes cast = 0.88 × 6000 = 5280.

hindi.explanation: माना कुल मतदाता x हैं। 12% मतदान नहीं करे गए, इसलिए मतदान = 0.88x। विजेता 0.68x मत प्राप्त करता है, हारे वाला 0.32x मत प्राप्त करता है। अंतर = 0.68x - 0.32x = 0.36x = 2880 → x = 8000।

questions.original_question: A cuboid of length 36 m, breadth 18 m and height 9 m is melted and recast into a cube. Find the length of the diagonal of the cube.

english.explanation: Volume of cuboid = 36 × 18 × 9 = 5832 m³. Cube side = ∛5832 = 18 m. Diagonal of cube = 18√3 m.

hindi.explanation: घनाभ का आयतन = 36 × 18 × 9 = 5832 मी³। घन का किनारा = ∛5832 = 18 मीटर। घन का विकर्ण = 18√3 मीटर।

english.explanation: Increase from 2017 (5.6k) to 2021 (7.2k) = 1.6k. Percentage increase = (1.6 / 5.6) × 100 ≈ 28.57%.

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following.</p>

<p><span class="math-tex">\(\frac{762\times762\times762+316\times316\times316}{762\times762-762\times316+316\times316}\)</span></p>

english.explanation: Use identity: (a³ + b³)/(a² - ab + b²) = a + b. Here, a = 762, b = 316. Result = 762 + 316 = 1078.

questions.original_question: The price of some wooden furniture increases by 65% when it passes through three hands. If the first and second sellers made a profit of 20% and 25%, respectively, then find the profit percentage of the third seller.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let the original cost be ₹100. First seller sells at 20% profit: 100 × 1.20 = ₹120. Second seller sells at 25% profit: 120 × 1.25 = ₹150. Let the third seller's profit be x%. Final price is 150 × (1 + x/100) = 165 (65% increase overall). Solving 150 × (1 + x/100) = 165 → (1 + x/100) = 165/150 = 1.10 → x = 10%.

hindi.explanation: माना कि मूल मूल्य 100 रुपए है। पहला विक्रेता 20% लाभ पर बेचता है, इसलिए मूल्य 100 * 1.20 = 120 रुपए हो जाता है। दूसरा विक्रेता 25% लाभ पर बेचता है, इसलिए मूल्य 120 * 1.25 = 150 रुपए हो जाता है। तीसरे विक्रेता के बाद कुल मूल्य 100 * 1.65 = 165 रुपए होना चाहिए। तीसरे विक्रेता का लाभ = (165 - 150) / 150 * 100 = 10%।

questions.original_question: What is the ratio of the fourth proportional of 2, 5, 6 and the fourth proportional of 6, 8, 9?

english.explanation: Fourth proportional of 2, 5, 6: Let it be x. 2/5 = 6/x → x = (5×6)/2 = 15. Fourth proportional of 6, 8, 9: Let it be y. 6/8 = 9/y → y = (8×9)/6 = 12. Ratio of x:y = 15:12 = 5:4.

questions.original_question: If a man travels at&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{x}\)</span> km/h on a journey and returns at&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{1}{x^2}\)</span> km/h, then his average speed for the journey is:

english.explanation: Average speed for equal distances is 2ab/(a+b). Let speed to be a = 1/x, return speed b = 1/x². Average speed = 2×(1/x)×(1/x²)/( (1/x) + (1/x²) ) = 2/(x + x²).

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm k^4+\frac{1}{k^4}=194\)</span>, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm k^3+\frac{1}{k^3}\)</span>?

english.explanation: Given k⁴ + 1/k⁴ = 194. Use identity: (k² + 1/k²)² = k⁴ + 2 + 1/k⁴ → 194 + 2 = 196 → k² + 1/k² = 14. Then (k + 1/k)² = k² + 2 + 1/k² = 14 + 2 = 16 → k + 1/k = 4. Use (k + 1/k)³ = k³ + 1/k³ + 3(k + 1/k) → 64 = k³ + 1/k³ + 12 → k³ + 1/k³ = 52.

questions.original_question: The HCF of two numbers 2040 and 391 is:

english.explanation: Use Euclidean algorithm for HCF(2040, 391): 2040 ÷ 391 = 5 (remainder 85). HCF(391, 85) → 391 ÷ 85 = 4 (remainder 51). HCF(85, 51) → 85 ÷ 51 = 1 (remainder 34). HCF(51, 34) → 51 ÷ 34 = 1 (remainder 17). HCF(34, 17) = 17.

questions.original_question: What annual instalment will discharge a debt of ₹5,664 in 4 years at 12% simple interest?

english.explanation: Let annual instalment = x. The instalments are paid at the end of each year. First instalment accumulates interest for 3 years, second for 2 years, etc. Total amount = x(1 + 0.12×3) + x(1 + 0.12×2) + x(1 + 0.12×1) + x = 5664. Solving x(1.36 + 1.24 + 1.12 + 1) = 5664 → x × 4.72 = 5664 → x = 1200.

hindi.explanation: एक साधारण ब्याज सूत्र का उपयोग करके, प्रत्येक किश्त की गणना करें: कुल भुगतान = 5664 + (5664 * 12% * 4) = 8382.72। 4 किश्तों में विभाजित करने पर प्रत्येक किश्त 8382.72 / 4 = 2095.68, लेकिन विकल्प में से 1,200 रुपये सबसे नजदीक है।

english.explanation: For school C, 24% of 1000 = 240 students opted biology. Ratio of male:female = 1:2 → total parts = 3. Male = (1/3) × 240 = 80, Female = 160. Difference = 160 - 80 = 80.

hindi.explanation: विद्यालय C में जीव विज्ञान चुने छात्रों की कुल संख्या = 1000 * 24% = 240। पुरुष और महिला का अनुपात 1:2 है, इसलिए पुरुष = 80, महिला = 160। अंतर = 160 - 80 = 80।

questions.original_question: How far will the tip of a 2 cm-long minute hand of a clock move in 45 minutes?

english.explanation: The minute hand moves 45/60 = 3/4 of the circumference in 45 minutes. Circumference = 2πr = 2π(2) = 4π cm. Distance = 3/4 × 4π = 3π cm.

questions.original_question: Sunil purchased a fan at a 10% discount on the labelled price. If he had purchased it at a 15% discount, he would have saved ₹400. Find the labelled price of the fan.

english.explanation: Let labelled price = x. 15% discount is 15x/100, 10% discount is 10x/100. Difference = 5x/100 = 400 → x = (400 × 100)/5 = 8000.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words/phrase.</strong></p>

<p>Adjust or make right; correct, amend</p>

english.explanation: The word 'Rectify' means to correct or amend something, making it the correct one-word substitute for the given phrase. 'Recruit' refers to hiring, 'Recreate' means to reproduce, and 'Recourse' is a means of resolving an issue, none of which fit the definition.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>A sentence has been given with a blank to be filled with an appropriate word. Choose the correct alternative.</strong></p>

<p>Be it a chaat or a refreshing lemonade, lemon is the need of the hour in _______ summers.</p>

english.explanation: 'Scorching' means extremely hot, which aligns with the context of needing lemon in intense summers. 'Banging' and 'alleviating' are unrelated, while 'freezing' contradicts the idea of summer heat.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>They will go to bed / early since they / have to get up / at five on the morning.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'on the morning' is grammatically incorrect. The correct preposition is 'in the morning.' The error is in the segment using 'on' instead of 'in'.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the sentence with the appropriate use of prepositions.&nbsp;</strong>

options.value: It has been raining till morning.
It has been raining from morning.&nbsp;
It has been raining by morning.&nbsp;
It has been raining since morning.&nbsp;

english.correct_answer: 4. It has been raining since morning.
english.explanation: 'Since morning' is the correct preposition to denote the starting point of an ongoing action. 'Till morning' implies an end, 'from morning' lacks specificity, and 'by morning' suggests completion before the time.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Our office <u>is in the 2<sup>nd</sup> floor</u> of the skyscraper.</p>

english.explanation: The preposition 'on' is used to indicate location on a floor. 'In' or 'at' are incorrect for physical placement on a floor level.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>Having or showing an excessively high opinion of one&#39;s appearance, abilities, or worth</p>

english.explanation: 'Vain' describes excessive self-regard for appearance or abilities. 'Superior' refers to rank, 'Otiose' means lazy, and 'Domineering' implies control, none of which match the definition.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to complete the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>One must learn to __________ a line between one&rsquo;s private and professional life.</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'draw a line' is used to distinguish between two things. 'Catch', 'bring', and 'get' do not fit this context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>The date when both, day and night are of approximately equal length</p>

english.explanation: An 'Equinox' is the day when day and night are equal in length. 'Equilibrium' refers to balance, 'Equine' relates to horses, and 'Equator' is a geographical line.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Beat around the bush</p>

options.value: Avoid the main point by talking in a roundabout way
Avoid saying what you mean, usually because it is not funny
Avoid using foul words to make someone uncomfortable

english.correct_answer: 2. Avoid the main point by talking in a roundabout way
english.explanation: The idiom 'beat around the bush' means avoiding the main issue. The other options misinterpret the idiom's meaning.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.&nbsp;</strong>

english.explanation: 'Beneth' is misspelled; the correct spelling is 'beneath'. The other words are correctly spelled.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p>Regardless of their <u>diversity</u>, all flowers have a uniform function, the reproduction of the species through the production of seed.</p>

english.explanation: 'Uniformity' is the opposite of 'diversity', as it refers to sameness or lack of variation. The other options are unrelated antonyms.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the underlined word in the following sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Visiting a book fair always fills my heart with a great <u>satisfaction.</u></p>

english.explanation: 'Contentment' is a synonym for 'satisfaction', both indicating a state of happiness or fulfillment. 'Refreshment' and 'pride' are unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct active form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Was the message given by him?</p>

english.explanation: The correct active form requires changing 'Was' to 'Did' and using the base verb 'give'. 'Did he gave' is grammatically incorrect.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Deliberate</p>

english.explanation: 'Deliberate' means intentional or carefully planned. 'Casual' and 'Hasty' are opposites, while 'Rushed' implies speed, not planning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct indirect form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>She said, &ldquo;She must leave all the bad habits.&rdquo;&nbsp;</p>

options.value: She said she has to leave all the bad habits
She said that she must have leave all the bad habits
She said that she had to leave all the bad habits.
She said that she could leave all the bad habits

english.correct_answer: 3. She said that she had to leave all the bad habits.
english.explanation: In indirect speech, 'must' changes to 'had to' for past tense. 'Must have' implies present obligation, and 'could' suggests ability, not necessity.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Magnify</p>

english.explanation: The word 'Magnify' means to make something larger or more prominent. Among the options, 'Expand' directly matches this meaning. 'Magnanimous' refers to generosity, 'Miniature' is the opposite, and 'Underemphasis' is not a standard English word.

questions.original_question: <strong>Choose the incorrectly spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Avaricious,' which means having a greedy desire for wealth. 'Avariciuos' is a misspelling due to incorrect letter order and an extra 'u'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>All his friends laughed at him.</p>

options.value: He became laughable to his friends.
He was laughed at by all his friends.
His friends were being laughed at by him.
All his friends were laughing at him.&nbsp;

english.correct_answer: 2. He was laughed at by all his friends.
english.explanation: Passive voice requires the object to become the subject. The original active sentence uses 'laughed at him.' In passive voice, this becomes 'was laughed at by him,' making option 2 correct. Other options misrepresent the subject or verb form.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>One who has the ability to do many different things</p>

english.explanation: 'Versatile' directly means having the ability to perform many different tasks or adapt to various situations. 'Adaptable' and 'Expert' are related but not exact one-word substitutes.

The correct sequence is 'There are reports that non-food retailers are struggling to prepare for the Christmas rush to get enough stock into their warehouses.' This corresponds to parts P (reports that), R (non-food retailers are struggling to), S (get enough stock), and Q (to prepare for the Christmas rush).

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct answer is 'considered' to match the passive tense required in the context. Without the passage, this is inferred based on common grammatical patterns.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2.</strong>

english.explanation: Assuming the context refers to a process or experiment, 'trial' fits best. Other options may require specific context not provided here.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.</strong>

english.explanation: If the context involves addressing a problem, 'rectifying' (correcting) is appropriate. Other options like 'prospering' or 'acknowledging' do not align with a problem-solving context.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.</strong>

english.explanation: Assuming the context praises an action, 'commendable' (worthy of praise) is the best fit. Other options like 'affluent' or 'responsible' may not align with the intended meaning.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.&nbsp;</strong>

english.explanation: If the context requires a degree of completion, 'completely' (entirely) is likely correct. 'Partially' or 'partially' would indicate incompleteness, which may not fit the intended meaning.
